description: The full name of the tournament, 'Valorant Champions 2024'.
A brief but informative description of the event.
The dates the tournament took place.
The total prize money for the event.
The physical location of the tournament.
The date the match was played.
Overall score of the match in 'X-Y' format.
The week or group stage of the tournament.
The stage of the tournament (e.g., Group Stage, Playoffs).
The team the player belongs to.
A list of agents the player used.
Average rating of the player across all games.
Percentage of rounds with a Kill, Assist, Survived, or Traded.
Number of clutches won out of clutches attempted (e.g., '3/21').
Maximum number of kills in a single map.
Number of times the map was played in the tournament.
Win percentage for the attacking side on this map.
Win percentage for the defending side on this map.
The percentage of total rounds played where the agent was picked.
A dictionary-like string containing the utilization percentage of the agent on each specific map.
The number of pistol rounds won by the team on that map.
The total number of economy rounds played, with the number won in parentheses.
The total number of semi-economy rounds played, with the number won in parentheses.
The total number of semi-buy rounds played, with the number won in parentheses.
The total number of full-buy rounds played, with the number won in parentheses.
The unique identifier for each match.
Number of times the player got 2 kills in a single round.
Number of times the player got 3 kills in a single round.
Number of times the player got 4 kills in a single round.
Number of times the player got 5 kills in a single round.
The stage of the tournament (e.g., Grand Final).
The agent played by the player on the map.
Player rating for the specific map/match.
Percentage of rounds with a Kill, Assist, Survived, or Traded.
The team that won the map.
The title of the match (e.g., 'Gen.G vs Sentinels').
A string listing the two competing teams.
Number of maps played in the match.
The game patch version the match was played on.
Details about the map pick and ban phase.
The order in which the map was played within the match.
The final score of the map.
The team that won the map.
The team that picked the map, or 'Decider'.
